select pv1_0.product_id,pv1_0.variation_id,c1_0.color_id,c1_0.color_name,c1_0.hex_code,pv1_0.product_price,pv1_0.product_variation_image,s1_0.size_id,s1_0.size_name from product_variation pv1_0 left join color c1_0 on c1_0.color_id=pv1_0.color_id left join size s1_0 on s1_0.size_id=pv1_0.size_id where pv1_0.product_id=?

select pv1_0.variation_id,c1_0.color_id,c1_0.color_name,c1_0.hex_code,p1_0.product_id,b1_0.brand_id,b1_0.brand_description,b1_0.brand_name,b1_0.created_at,b1_0.logo_url,b1_0.updated_at,b1_0.website_url,c2_0.category_id,c2_0.category_description,c2_0.category_name,c2_0.created_at,c2_0.image_url,c2_0.updated_at,p1_0.created_at,p1_0.product_description,p1_0.product_name,p1_0.updated_at,pv1_0.product_price,pv1_0.product_variation_image,s1_0.size_id,s1_0.size_name from product_variation pv1_0 left join color c1_0 on c1_0.color_id=pv1_0.color_id left join product p1_0 on p1_0.product_id=pv1_0.product_id left join brand b1_0 on b1_0.brand_id=p1_0.brand_id left join category c2_0 on c2_0.category_id=p1_0.category_id left join size s1_0 on s1_0.size_id=pv1_0.size_id where pv1_0.variation_id=?
select st1_0.transaction_id,st1_0.variation_id,st1_0.quantity,st1_0.stock_id,st1_0.transaction_date,st1_0.transaction_type from stock_transaction st1_0 order by st1_0.transaction_id desc
